entries.title: Walter Ulloa, Latino media pioneer, remembered as a 'role model'
entries.description: Entravision founder Walter Ulloa, who died at 74, was remembered by Latino leaders as a Spanish-language media pioneer.

entries.title: Salesforce to cut workforce by 10% after pandemic hiring spree
entries.description: Salesforce plans to cut its workforce by 10% and close some offices, saying it needs to cut costs after rapid pandemic hiring left it with “too many people”
